project.context.localization.common.helper

Class PositionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.context.localization.common.helper.PositionsHelper

  • public class PositionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    The Position helper offers commonly used methods and attributes for resolving information about places and their relating zone descriptions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String[] bluePlaces
      The constant bluePlaces contains all places in the cell of the blue beacon.
      static int ITEM_SCAN11
      The constant ITEM_SCAN11 indicates its position in the menu at 1.

      The constant ITEM_SCAN12 indicates its position in the menu at 2.

      The constant ITEM_SCAN41 indicates its position in the menu at 7.

      The constant ITEM_SCAN42 indicates its position in the menu at 8.
      static java.lang.String[] redPlaces
      The constant redPlaces contains all places in the cell of the red beacon.
      static java.lang.String[] yellowPlaces
      The constant yellowPlaces contains all places in the cell of the yellow beacon.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentZoneDescription

        public static java.lang.String getCurrentZoneDescription()
        Returns the information to display the user at the current found place. The currentZone is stored in the PositionHelper, thus, does not need to be passed into this method.
        Returns:
        String to give a user a hint where to go next

      • getMenuLabelForPosition

        public static java.lang.String getMenuLabelForPosition(int position)
        Gets menu label for a scrolling position.
        Parameters:
        position - the position in the menu
        Returns:
        the menu label for position

      • isZoneDifferentWithPriorAndCurrentPlace

        public static boolean isZoneDifferentWithPriorAndCurrentPlace(java.lang.String priorPlace,
                                                              java.lang.String currentPlace)
        Gets the zone (aggregation of places) by comparing prior and current place.
        Parameters:
        priorPlace - the prior place during localization
        currentPlace - the current place during localization
        Returns:
        if the the current zone changed
